pkgmetadata.longdescription: Post-processing tool for ADAPT 5 // AMGET allows to simply and rapidly creates highly informative diagnostic plots for ADAPT 5 models. Features include data analysis prior any modeling form either NONMEM or ADAPT shaped dataset, goodness-of-fit plots (GOF), posthoc-fits plots (PHF), parameters distribution plots (PRM) and visual predictive check plots (VPC) based on ADAPT output.
